faqs.question: DOES RPT HURT?
faqs.answer: No! One of the benefits of RPT is that we can adjust the amount of pressure based on your real-time feedback. Most customers feel minimal discomfort, if any at all. Many find it so relaxing they fall asleep during the therapy.

faqs.question: HOW DOES RPT ALLEVIATE PAIN?
faqs.answer: RPT works to fix the problem by treating the affected muscles. Lengthening the muscles helps restore the body to its natural state. This increases range of motion, relieves pain, and improves blood flow.RPT works to fix the problem by treating the affected muscles. Lengthening the muscles helps restore the body to its natural state. This increases range of motion, relieves pain, and improves blood flow.

faqs.question: HOW MANY SESSIONS ARE NEEDED?
faqs.answer: RPT is momentum-based. We recommend weekly visits until your pain subsides. Most people feel noticeable relief after the first session. Long-term chronic pain usually requires more sessions than more recent ailments. On average, clients need around 5 sessions, although some range from 1 to 10. Many people enjoy the therapy so much that they make it part of their quarterly health routine.

faqs.question: DO I NEED A REFERRAL?
faqs.answer: No. We have therapists on staff that are able to assess the root cause of your ailment and create a customized therapy and start treatment on your first appointment.

faqs.question: HOW MUCH DOES RPT COST?
faqs.answer: Robotic Precision Therapy is $150 per hour.  The first session is 1.5 hours ($225) which allows time for a full assessment and full treatment.  Most subsequent sessions will be one treatment hour ($150).  Accepted forms of payment include cash, credit, FSA, and HSA.

faqs.question: DO YOU TAKE INSURANCE?
faqs.answer: We are an out-of-pocket clinic, allowing us to provide therapy tailored to your needs without the restrictions often imposed by insurance. This way, you receive the optimal amount and duration of therapy to achieve the best results for your well-being.
